item.title: Making Your Own GitHub Pages Blog
item.description: Guide Contents: Introduction Hugo Description Setup Picking a Theme Adding content Generating the Static Files GitHub Pages Setting up your Git Repo Pushing your changes More to Consider Further Customization Introduction This guide explains how I went about hosting this blog. At the time of this posting, I am running 64-bit Ubuntu 16.04 LTS on an HP EliteBook 8460p.
